overview: Scarlett Sage is a reporter for a local newspaper. She's looking for a big scoop when she stumbles upon a resident who got taken by aliens. When she sees that she's not only located in the same state but is running for Congress, she knows she's on to something big. All she has to do now is contact her and get her to agree to an interview. When she notices theirs a phone number included in the article, she calls Miss Summers immediately. When she reaches her on the phone, Miss Summers is more than happy to talk about what happened to her. When Scarlett presses her with questions, she informs her of a worldwide conspiracy regarding alien life and a cover-up involving all the governments of the world.
title: Lesbaliens
